BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: Oversight - NYC: ATWORK Employment Program for New Yorkers with Disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - NYC: ATWORK Employment Program for New Yorkers with Disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing accessibility guidelines for print documents
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing accessibility guidelines for print documents.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing information on wheelchair repair providers and related services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing information on wheelchair repair providers and related services.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the MTA and NYCTA to adopt federally-recommended measures to ensure that access-a-ride serves New Yorkers on-time.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling on the MTA and NYCTA to adopt federally-recommended measures to ensure that access-a-ride serves New Yorkers on-time.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education and the New York State Education Department to meet their obligations under state and federal law to provide impartial due process hearings in a timely manner as they relate to resolving complaints filed by families of students with disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC DOE and the NYS Education Dept to meet their obligations under state and federal law to provide impartial due process hearings in a timely manner as they relate to resolving complaints filed by families of students with disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a film, television, and theater accessibility fund to promote the employment of persons with disabilities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a film, television, and theater accessibility fund to promote the employment of persons with disabilities.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Dinowitz, Marte and Public Advocate Williams
